title: Draven minions
body: So some of draven minions are not working for me. They were fine before when I started the game. But I got disconnected and restarted the game. Then I noticed that draven minions.., have changed? I added a pic that I took with my phone. Does anyone else have this too ? And how do I fix it ? Its so annoying..

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Disconnects may the culprit here. :c Some funky things happen when the game tries to reload a game in progress. If this is happening without a disconnect, I would suggest doing a quick Client Repair!

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=Fr4PPNV0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-01T16:41:34.392+0000)
>
> Hiya! 
> 
> Disconnects may the culprit here. :c Some funky things happen when the game tries to reload a game in progress. If this is happening without a disconnect, I would suggest doing a quick Client Repair!

Did a client repair, I still see Dravens. {{champion:236}} <--- sarcasm face.
